General.Name: Solid State System Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Solid State System Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of integrated circuits in Taiwan. It offers storage solutions, including USB flash controllers and SSD turn-key solutions; multimedia audio solutions, such as USB speaker, headset, and line-in controllers; and MEMS microphones. Solid State System Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.
